edu.mines.jtk.sgl

Class MouseOnPlane

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.mines.jtk.sgl.MouseConstrained
      • edu.mines.jtk.sgl.MouseOnPlane

  • public class MouseOnPlane
extends MouseConstrained
    A mouse constrained by a plane. Constrained points (in local coordinates) lie on a constraint plane that contains a specified origin point and is parallel to a specified plane.

    Given a mouse event with pixel (x,y) coordinates, a mouse-on-plane computes a constrained point. When the mouse pixel coordinates equal those used to construct the mouse-on-plane, the constrained point equals the specified origin point.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MouseOnPlane

        public MouseOnPlane(java.awt.event.MouseEvent event,
            Point3 origin,
            Plane plane,
            Matrix44 localToPixel)
        Constructs a mouse constrained by a plane. The constraint plane contains the specified origin point and is parallel to the specified plane. The origin point is typically near, but not necessarily on, the specified plane.
        Parameters:
        event - the initial mouse event.
        origin - the origin point, in local coordinates.
        plane - the plane, in local coordinates.
        localToPixel - the transform from local to pixel coordinates.

    • Method Detail

      • getPoint

        public Point3 getPoint(java.awt.event.MouseEvent event)
        Gets the constrained point in local coordinates for the specified event. The constrained point lies in the constraint plane that contains the origin point.
        Specified by:
        getPoint in class MouseConstrained
        Parameters:
        event - the mouse event.
        Returns:
        the constrained point, in local coordinates.
